entry.title: ljt019/exhibit_manager: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Rocket and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.
entry.content: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Rocket and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.

entry.title: safaroww/converter: A lightweight and user-friendly app to convert images between PNG, JPG, JPEG, and WEBP formats effortlessly. With an intuitive design, this app makes managing your images a breeze.

entry.title: i24k3/onlyjs: onlyjs is a lightweight JavaScript library for fast and easy UI development. It allows you to quickly create, style, and render HTML elements with minimal code, making DOM manipulation effortless and efficient.
entry.content: onlyjs is a lightweight JavaScript library for fast and easy UI development. It allows you to quickly create, style, and render HTML elements with minimal code, making DOM manipulation effortless and efficient.
